title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\InspectJobConfig
name: InspectJobConfig
description:
Controls what and how to inspect for findings.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.InspectJobConfig

params.name: data

params.name: data.inspect_template_name
params.description: If provided, will be used as the default for all values in InspectConfig. inspect_config will be merged into the values persisted as part of the template.

params.description: Actions to execute at the completion of the job.
